titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on 1-Propenoic acid, polymer with (chloromethyl)oxirane, formaldehyde, 2-(hydroxymethyl)-2-[[(1-oxo-2-propenyl)oxy]methyl]-1,3-propanediyl di-2-propenoate, 5-isocyanato-1-(isocyanatomethyl)-1,3,3-trimethyleyclohexane and 2-methylphenol (9Cl).

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/6/2006--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 1-Propenoic acid, polymer with (chloromethyl)oxirane, formaldehyde, 2-(hydroxymethyl)-2-[[(1-oxo-2-propenyl)oxy]methyl]-1,3-propanediyl di-2-propenoate, 5-isocyanato-1-(isocyanatomethyl)-1,3,3-trimethyleyclohexane and 2-methylphenol (9Cl).
